blog.models module¶

class blog.models.Post(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: Model

Represents a blog post in the application.

id¶

A unique identifier for the post.

Type:

AutoField

title¶

The title of the post, limited to 140 characters.

Type:

CharField

body¶

The main content of the post, with a default string.

Type:

TextField

signature¶

The author’s signature, limited to 140 characters, defaulting to “Calvin Hattingh”.

Type:

CharField

date¶

The date and time when the post was created.

Type:

DateTimeField

exception DoesNotExist¶

Bases: ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Bases: MultipleObjectsReturned

body¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

date¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.
